department.en: Master‘s Program in Construction Management, Department of Civil Engineering

goal.en: "Provide students the nutshell of communication, from personal level to project or organizational level. By case study, students will learn to apply communication techniques to resolve conflicts."
goal.ch: 提供同學各種有關溝通之理論與實務概念，透過個案研討讓同學領略溝通之方法與技巧。

content.en:
1. Introduction & People Communication
2. Organization and Communication
3. Time Management
4. Project Communication
5. Computer Advancement and Applications
6. Management Information System
7. Enterprise Resource Planning
8. Building Information Moduling
9. RFID & WSN
content.ch:

3. 個人時間管理
4. 專案溝通管理
5. 電腦發展與Web 應用
6. 管理資訊系統MIS
7. ERP簡介
8. BIM
9. RFID & WSN
